topic: Should we increase the carbon tax?

retrieved_docs.text: Carbon tax policy briefing Key findings: - Incremental increases of $5 per ton maintain competitiveness. - Revenue recycling funds community solar programs. - Recent market report (April 2025) notes a 12% rise in clean-tech jobs when carbon pricing is paired with rebates. Implementation notes: - Coordinate with finance ministry for dividend schedule. - Monitor global commodity prices quarterly.
retrieved_docs.label: Doc 1
